form.label: ASD Essential 8 - User application hardening - Details

panel.title: Allowed Flash and Shockwave by Domain

search.query: | tstats values(Web.user) as user count from datamodel=Web where (nodename=Web.Proxy (Web.http_content_type=*Shockwave* OR Web.http_content_type=*Flash* OR Web.http_user_agent="Java*" OR http_user_agent="*flash")) by Web.dest, Web.http_content_type | sort -count | rename dest as Domain

| tstats values(Web.user) as user count from datamodel=Web where (nodename=Web.Proxy (Web.category=*Web Ads* OR Web.category=*Advertisement*)) by Web.dest, Web.http_content_type | sort -count | rename dest as Domain
